import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { NewAppContext } from "../../App"; import "./DashboardHome.css"; const DashboardHome = () => { const { depositInfo, setDepositInfo } = useContext(NewAppContext); // calculate deposit amount console.log(depositInfo); const depositAmount = []; depositInfo?.map((data) => depositAmount.push(data?.depositAmount)); const totalDeposit = depositAmount?.reduce( (prev, curr) => parseFloat(prev) + parseFloat(curr) ); console.log("object", totalDeposit); return (

Current Balance

{/* card 2 */}

); }; export default DashboardHome;
